items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t finished doing that by 2:30, but Mary was.

I apologized, but even then she wouldn\'t speak to me.
I asked Tom to make sure that he didn\'t show up late.
I\'m sure the police will eventually catch the robber.
It\'s the sort of day when you\'d like to stay in bed.
Tom was a part-time carpenter while he was in college.
I still believe that we can get this done before 2:30.
I suppose Tom and Mary have both changed a great deal.
I suppose both Tom and Mary have changed a great deal.
I sure never thought Tom would do something like that.
I\'m afraid I can\'t make myself understood in French.
That must\'ve happened while Tom and I were in Boston.
